snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include the possibility that the N.R.A.'s new shooting app may be diverting attention from gun violence, a man who...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include the possibility that the N.R.A.'s new shooting app may be diverting attention from gun violence, a man who inexplicably is the target of phone-finder apps and 911 call locators, and an analysis of the criminal case against Aaron Swartz.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: BitTorrent TV  and Swartz Charges
